aggregations.title: Aggregates
aggregations.description: Aggregate function(s) to perform on events. E.g., sum(bytes).where(action=='REJECT').as(TotalBytes)

groupBys.title: Group by fields
groupBys.description: Fields to group aggregates by, supports wildcard expressions.

maxEvents.title: Maximum number of events
maxEvents.description: Specifies how many events are at max kept in memory to be enriched with aggregations
